title: Waverley steps: a visit to Edinburgh
creator_credit: Paul Fletcher, Greenpark Productions and John Eldridge
brief_description: A description of Edinburgh, past and present. The film attempts more to convey the atmosphere of the city than to give a straight description of its outstanding features.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Fletcher, Greenpark Productions and John Eldridge
